wikipedia_page.main: Alan Blackburn (4 August 1935 – January 2014) was an English footballer. He played outside-left professionally for West Ham United and Halifax Town between 1954 and 1961, making a total of 139 Football League appearances. Blackburn died in January 2014.

response: * 14 January 2014: Alan Blackburn, 78, former West Ham United and Halifax Town forward.
**Alan Blackburn, 78, footballer. (death announced on this date)
